title: On the free metabelian transposed Poisson and F-manifold algebras
authors: K. Abdukhalikov and B. K. Sartayev
abstract:
In this paper, we consider free transposed Poisson algebra and free
F-manifold algebra with an additional metabelian identity. We construct a
linear basis for both free metabelian transposed Poisson algebra and free
metabelian F-manifold algebra.
